short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unoffical moddifications written by odyssey adding quality of life to the game at PBBG.dev. Join the game discord and say hi.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: these are a series of modifications that add things like drop rate displays and merchant sales totals to the game at PBBG.DEV, these mods were compiled as user scripts by the user odyssey in the discord and then compiled into an extension by the community manager (with permission) while these mod's are not official the staff team for the game has approved them.
